summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 19th Avenue North from East Roy Street to East Galer Street et al in the City of Seattle, by grading and by constructing concrete walks and watermains under Ordinance No. 12992, creating Local Improvement District No. 1176 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
